item.title: This drain on the junction with the no-through-road in Whittington has blocked. We have dug out some material but it is too deep for us to clear and is causing a problem for the heavy traffic flow caused by the closure of the London Road in Charlton Kings., 15th September

item.title: Road is uneven, 14th September
item.description:
The recent work on this part of the road has made it worse. It was such an awful short term fix and waste of money. This stretch of the road will damage cars. This needs to be corrected immediately, otherwise I will be contacting the local MP to highlight the issue and the waste in taxpayer money.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Foul water going down Mill street as far as Church Court Cottages from Southam Road, 14th September
item.description:
Dirty smelling water affecting walkers that use the street, had to warn a young couple with toddlers on bicycles. Cars sending up spray at any pedestrians in vicinity.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southam Road, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
